law.text: The term "department" as used in KRS 12.210 to 12.230 shall be construed to mean and to include each and every executive or administrative department, program cabinet, division, office and independent agency as said terms are defined and set forth in KRS Chapter 12, and shall include any administrative department, program cabinet, division, office and independent agency heretofore or hereafter designated as such by the General Assembly.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art, I, sec. 11. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 122, sec. 1.
